programme.desc: The new Coach witnesses Jamie bullying the other kids at lunch and steps in. Jamie is made to apologise, much to the amazement of the other kids. Gumball and Darwin worry about Jamie seeking revenge, especially when they see him sneaking into the back of Coachs car. They use their newly acquired gym skills to save the Coach from being bullied.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball wants to take down Miss Simian after she punishes him for not respecting his school-provided calculator.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball vows to wear a shell and partake in strange Fitzgerald traditions, in order to help Penny get through a tense family birthday party with ease.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry. When they call to complain about their late pizza its the final straw for Larry and he quits all of his jobs. Elmores fragile commercial structure collapses and the citizens revert to a more primitive apocalyptic state.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. The whole town embrace this festival and get excited about the arrival of the Sluzzle Dude; leaving it to Gumball and Anais to keep everyones Sluzzle Tag dreams alive.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. Miss Simian warns them about the Butterfly Effect whereby the flap of an insects wings can start a tornado on the other side of the world. Paying no heed, Gumball releases the emergent butterfly into the wild, where it causes havoc upon Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Things keep going missing in the house, so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. They discover that a mysterious person has been secretly living in their home. Gumball and Darwin manage to turn this confused squatter into their mortal enemy.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated by her family, Nicole strikes up a friendship with a sympathetic AI. As their relationship intensifies, the AI tries to drive a wedge between Nicole and the other Wattersons.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richard must retrace the memories of his day in order to figure out what "the thing" is, so Nicoles family dinner with Granny Jo Jo wont be another epic failure.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. When they find one that depicts Gumball running naked through the mall, Gumball is determined not to let it come to pass. However events conspire against him, and Gumball learns that sometimes you cant fight fate.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. He tries to protect them from the world around them and soon Darwins over-protective control-freakery spreads to every corner of Elmore. The Wattersons have no choice but to overthrow his despotic regime.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his sister, Jessica, try their hand at running the daycare at the Creek.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his friends come upon a mysterious Moss Village, which could aid them in their quest for the Heart of the Forest.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: On the eve of a big holiday party, the Williams kids are locked out of the house, leading to a frantic search all over town for a spare key.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger brings home an aerosol can of Rat Cop, rat and mouse repellent, to help Tom do his job. And its not your typical rodent repellent! When the spray makes a human-shaped cop appear, it yells at Jerry and starts pursuit, along with Tom.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: How can one little golf ball cause a crater the size of a house? By hurtling through space - thats how! One little rock can cause a chain reaction by hitting bigger and bigger pieces.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad commissions a portrait of himself from Mrs Otter but cant keep still enough for her to paint him. Will there ever be a portrait of Toad hanging in Toad Hall?

programme.desc: When Toad throws out an old chair, he immediately regrets it but the Weasels have now claimed it. Can Toad and his friends persuade them to return it to him?

programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: An integrated circuit containing an artificial intelligence accidentally connects to Grizzys stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life like a modern-day Pinocchio. Grizzy educates the chip until it decides to connect to the Lemmings robot to play with them. When the AI becomes a teenager, it is no longer interested in either Grizzy or the Lemmings and prefers using a smartphone to keep learning. Grizzy and the Lemmings join efforts to try and reset the chips memory and relive its childhood phase over and over.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen that transforms his favorite documentary film into an incredible light and sound experience. But his pleasure is ruined by the Lemmings fiesta. While he chases after his housemates to destroy their disco equipment, he discovers with astonishment that Asian clones of himself and the Lemmings are also engaged in a high-speed pursuit.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: The Kazoom Kids and Smellvelous must face a toxic cloud released by Stinkator, which turns the SuperThings into zombies at his mercy.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.desc: The gangs trip to be bayou is ruined by a shambling Swamp Beast thats scaring away anyone who dares to enter its soggy domain!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean is determined to win but hadnt counted on the competitive dads dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Doc Specs and Lamput finds themselves stranded on an island. Will they be able to get home? Or maybe they will make a new home on the island. Has Doc Specs traded Doc Skinny for Lamput as his best friend? Crazier things have happened!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings, who are both starving, discover a temple dedicated to an ancestral brioche. According to the book lying open inside the temple, to obtain a perfect brioche you must gather three gold ingredients and set them on the altar. When the panda idol who guards the temple receives the offering, the person will receive his favorite food in abundance. Grizzy and Lemmings set out to find the sacred ingredients but there is no question of working together. May the best critter win!

programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Beans Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: To solve the mystery of a ghostly performer haunting her former venue the Gang has to pretend to be a rock band themselves! But can they solve the case before Velma has to actually get on stage and sing?

programme.sub-title: If You Cant Scooby-Doo the Time Dont Scooby-Doo the Crime
programme.desc: Fred is excited to visit The Vault, a high security prison that no convict has ever escaped from. But when the ghost of Stealing Stan, an inmate who always claimed to be innocent, terrorises the prison, Fred has to solve the mystery and rethink his stance on criminal justice!

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Just like every year for Halloween, Fred refuses to leave the house. He believes that no mysteries will be solved on that day and that nothing will go as planned.

programme.desc: Fred switches places with Jeff, the tour guide at a history museum, to give him a chance to lead the Gang in solving a mystery. The mystery: a frightening Egyptian crocodile deity is terrorizing the museum. The problem: Fred is instantly jealous of this new guy and sets out to solve the mystery before Jeff can - with the help of Jeffs tour group of children!

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy and Scoobys favourite chef is finally opening his own restaurant but a monstrous Yeti threatens the opening night. The gang has to solve the mystery before desert is served and Shaggy and Scooby have to resist eating all the food thats meant for the customers!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput spends the day at the beach, and, in a pair of swimming trunks, cuts a fine figure indeed. That is to say; a small, round and blobby figure. It only takes one snide comment from a fellow beach-goer to bring Lamputs body issues to the surface. When youre a shape changer, though, theres no need for exercise; before long Lamput is strutting along as an orange amalgam of all the best-looking sunbakers. On the up side, its a handy disguise when the Docs come a-hunting. On the down side? Well, its kind of tiring pretending to be someone youre not. Lamput learns an important lesson from a nearby blobby little girl. Be yourself, and if anyones got a problem with that, they can go find their own patch of sand.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how its done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but cant escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Beans mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to "break" his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: It might be Sunday, but Specs just wont let up: his obsession with Lamput knows no weekends. Skinny, on the other hand, knows just how to spend his day off. Asleep, thats how. Even if his workaholic buddy insists on dragging him through the usual pointless search. The call of a morning coffee wins the day, though; when Specs finally agrees to take a break, he discovers that even orange blobs like a sleep-in. And pancakes. Lots of pancakes.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: As the Lemmings rummage through an abandoned delivery tricycle filled with strange objects, they discover a delicious treasure: Yummy-filled Chinese brioches! Grizzy steals their tasty bounty and heads off to enjoy it alone in the cabin. The Lemmings find a mask in the tricycle that terrifies anyone who looks at it when its being worn by someone. The Lemmings intend to use their horrific new power to recover their stolen treats.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay hands on an ancient console that lets you play life-sized games in the real world. The console emits magical streams of energy that randomly pick avatars to confront one another. Grizzy is chosen as the hero. He must leap onto platforms and confront both enemies and a fearsome leader: a panda equipped with bamboo sticks. The Lemmings are obviously in control of the joystick!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky, elastic threads are absolutely perfect for bungee jumping. Grizzy, who has no intention of getting caught in the web, decides to crush the insect. The only problem: he discovers that he has arachnophobia, which is seriously going to complicate the task.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. Redbird must overcome his fear of taking baths if hes going to help Bam bring Clayface to justice.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him! The rest of the Batwheels must learn how to use their big new bodies to undo the wish!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi just cant put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bams utility belt for a mission. Can she overcome the enticing distraction to save the day when Bams mis-packed belt goes haywire?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a party boat for Mac and Tosh when Tweety accidentally makes a mistake but doesnt ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a lighthouse for Looneyburg, Lolas tablet breaks and she must rely on herself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the final hole of ACME Acres Mini Golf Course, and Porky is determined to get it just right for the kids.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry and Tuffy discover Gingers surprise for Rick in the garage: a brand-new air hockey table. They enjoy floating in zero gravity before Tom comes in and stops the fun. Soon, Butch challenges Tom to a game, until they start chasing Tuffy into the house and out back.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry break a picture frame on the wall, Rick gives Tom an ultimatum that hes out for good if he breaks one more thing. Despite Toms earnest response, he breaks something right after Rick leaves to purchase a new frame. Attempting to fix the problem, Tom borrows tools and coveralls from a repair truck nearby but cant stop breaking things in the repair process.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry overhears that a brand-new butler will arrive at the household later that day, the crafty mouse whips together a butlers outfit and knocks on the door, pretending to be the new arrival—to get unbridled access to the pantry. How long will Jerrys disguise work, and what happens when the real butler arrives?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom goes through reverse evolution and is transformed into a swamp monster, he uses it to his advantage, scaring creatures that frightened him earlier. Soon he sees Van Mouseling in the woods and cant resist chasing him all over.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Kept awake by Tom watching TV, Jerry goes outside and encounters some lightning bugs. The smallest one cant keep up, so Jerry steals Toms energy drink for the little guy. It helps, but soon the super-charged bug causes unexpected issues for Tom and Jerry.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Skullie warns Tom that its almost midnight, so hed best be on alert for one of the Catsylvania ghouls to show up. Tom reaches for a towel to wipe the soap out of his eyes but is shocked to discover that hes not using a towel at all, but a Mummy-cats wrap! Soon, the Mummy-cat finds ways to freak out Tom and befuddle him, Jerry and Tuffy all over the house.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella is enlisted to pet sit Buttons, a friends dog, on the very day she has to finish a school project about Venus. She decides to take on both responsibilities at once by taking Buttons with her to the planet to capture the final piece of video footage she needs. When the thunder from the storms around Venus scare Buttons into accidentally detaching himself from his pod, he lands on the pla net and disappears. Ella and her friends search frantically on the hot planet but cannot find him. Its Buttons who finds Ella! Ella admits she shouldnt have taken her furry friend with her, but at least she learned new facts for her project!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys Dad insists he get rid of all his inventions to free up some space. Slippy cant bear to, so decides to store them on the dark side of Mercury.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: On Sedna, Ella and her friends discover the space probe Voyager 1. Ella takes the Golden Record from the probe and takes it to Mom who reveals that Ellas greatest grandfather recorded a greeting on it!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Human Day is Ellas favourite day of the year and she invites Madhu to join her family for dinner. Madhu wants to make a good impression and wonders how to prepare.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: While checking out a rogue planet, Ella, Slippy and Madhu crash onto its surface. When the heat from underground causes the planets icy crust to burst open, they all tumble down into the darkness and become separated.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Hedge normally hibernates but this year she is determined to see Christmas. Although shes not much use in decoration preparation, she is able to bring peace and understanding to all when there is a dispute over the Christmas Tree.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Tinker comes up with a cunning plan for herself and Chief to be delivered as a parcel into Toad Hall. But the journey there proves to be more much more arduous than she could possibly imagine.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Chief agrees to accompany Toad on a day trip out in the car but only if he can drive. Chiefs plan is to steal the car by throwing Toad out but his erratic driving sees them perched precariously over the river bank. Can they ever be friends now?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Hedge learns to play chess, she fails to win gracefully. Soon no-one will play with her!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty is trying out his new snorkelling equipment but Portly mistakes Ratty underwater as a River Monster. An alarmed Hedge exaggerates the story and Toad tries to catch the River Monster on camera as all the riverbankers rush to witness this fabled creature.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A puzzling puzzle has Mr Bean truly puzzled.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to embrace and use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage if hes going to put a stop to Pranks latest scheme.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as hes tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes although Daphnes more focused on nailing Fred with a revenge snowball. Their snowy fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve and Fred is ready to solve a Christmas mystery! Unfortunately the town the gang has arrived in is being attacked by a Pterodactyl and it doesnt seem to have anything to do with Christmas!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who is an Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become "inventive" himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost a cleverness competition, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells, Teddy smells, Bean smells … bad. He comes home, determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside, on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how its done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Fugitive Lamput ends up in a seedy dive by the waterfront. It happens when youre on the run. These thugs sure know how to have fun, though; people come from far and wide to be creamed at arm wrestling by gigantic Mr Moustache. Its a jumpin scene - until those two dorks from the Lab walk in, and start kicking up a stink about the new extremely orange trophy thats up for grabs. The Boss (apparently an old bikie at heart) is more than up for the arm wrestling challenge. Its the bicep-off of the decade, with Lamput as the prize.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamputs new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of "Duplicate" Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates cant be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.desc: An integrated circuit containing an artificial intelligence accidentally connects to Grizzys stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life like a modern-day Pinocchio. Grizzy educates the chip until it decides to connect to the Lemmings robot to play with them. When the AI becomes a teenager, it is no longer interested in either Grizzy or the Lemmings and prefers using a smartphone to keep learning. Grizzy and the Lemmings join efforts to try and reset the chips memory and relive its childhood phase over and over.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen that transforms his favorite documentary film into an incredible light and sound experience. But his pleasure is ruined by the Lemmings fiesta. While he chases after his housemates to destroy their disco equipment, he discovers with astonishment that Asian clones of himself and the Lemmings are also engaged in a high-speed pursuit.

programme.desc: A knock on the head turns Tom into Quixote that leads him into battle with Butch over Toodles affections.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A trip to the woods leads to an unexpected encounter with Big Foot.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Meathead turns into a genius when he gulps down a bottle of specially formulated water.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The Duke returns from India with some wild animals that escape their cages and begin to terrorize the manor. Tom is tasked with putting everything back in order.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A stranger with a diving rod promises to find water for the farm.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Beans girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bears Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery and the amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made Bean opens up his own strange successful coffee bar …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists hes an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy - the winner being the first to climb "The Big One", a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadnt counted on the competitive dads dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman. He tries increasingly ridiculous ways to warm up his tea his toothpaste and himself before venturing out to discover somewhere to hunker down and get warm.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy takes the gang to the Minor League Baseball stadium of his youth only to learn that its about to be shut down because a Ghostly Baseball Player is scaring away the fans - and the team! programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landladys vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that its rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean

Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput faints of thirst on a desert highway, so already its not a great day for the little orange shape-shifter. Specs and Skinny learn a valuable lesson: maybe if youre going to anger a morphing super-blob by throwing them in the back of a van and withholding precious water, you shouldnt do it whilst driving by a 100 foot cliff drop down to the open ocean. Hopefully these Docs are better swimmers than your average academic.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput cant stop reading and gets caught! Back at the lab, the story intrigues everyone who is brought on a captivating adventure - featuring Lamput, Specs and Skinny in the leading role of a classic folktale. Robinput and his mates fight evil dictatorship for the perfect bedtime story.
